definition: to follow/to adhere to/to abide by
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Our ignorance of the world traps us in cycles of misery.
sentences.chinese: 我們對這世界的無知使我們陷入循環性的悲慘。

sentences.english: Circulation is one of the basic features of interpretation.
sentences.chinese: 循環性是詮釋的基本特徵之一。

sentences.english: Certainly with circularity and question begging.
The first manager represents the case for cyclical unemployment.
sentences.chinese: 第一個經理象徵循環性失業的情況。
